occurrenceRemarks: "Etamine différant beaucoup du dessin de M. Naudin.", A. Cogniaux "Stamens (fide Cogniaux) and trichomes as Miconia albicans (Sw.) Triana. Perhaps this may be only a variation, with smaller leaves and inflorescences.", R. Goldenby, 2004
